column5: I'm looking for recommendations for a campground reasonably close to the southern part of Mississauga. Looking for a site for a tent for 5-6 Sep. 08 while attending a course at St. John Ambulance in Mississauga. Reasonably quiet with toilets & shower will meet my needs.  Thanks: Rick
Here is a map Rick http://maps.google.com/maps?sourceid=navcl...=1&ct=image  The closest grounds are Bronte And probably your best bet. http://www.brontecreek.org/
danbo & Wild thanks for your responses.  Rick
